body.p: Registrere epoastačujuhusa vuostáiváldit ođasreivve ja dieđu go giinu cealká.

Sámi Siida lea dán jagi addán giellastipeanddaid Matias Westii, Nora Pieskii (govas) ja Anni Koivistoi. Stipeanddaid ožžo dannego leat čájehan erenoamáš beroštumi sámegiela geavaheamis skuvllas ja astoáiggis.

Sámi Siida addá juohke giđa 100 € stipeanda Gáregasnjárgga skuvlla 9. luohkálaš nurrii, Ohcejotnjálmmi skuvlla 9. luohkálaš nurrii ja Sápmelašlogahaga 3. luohkálažžii. Stipeanddat geigejuvvojit nuoraide skuvlafeasttas.

Dan jagi Sámi Siida lea spiehkastan veaháš njuolggadusain ja addán stipeanttaid ovtta logahaga studentii ja guovtti Gáregasnjárgga skuvlla 9. luohkálažžii dannego gávnnaimet guokte buori evttohasa Gáregasnjárggas.
Buot stipeandaoažžut leat viššalit barggain sámegielain skuvllas ja geavahan sámegiela skuvlla olggobealde. Lihku sávvat sidjiide.

You will wish you had more than a couple days. I was there for two weeks last year, drinivg the whole time to different places, and it wasn"t long enough. Next year I am going for three weeks. You will love it no matter how long you"re there. Enjoy!

I have to say he helped loads of peploe quit. I quit after reading his easyway (not for women, why isn"t there one for men? Why do you get your own book?) too. Was off them for 8 months before I started again. Maybe it"s time to dig the book out and read it again.

I felt a bit sorry for the chick getting owned by Allen but she deevresd it, as a person who has smoked for years, I tried replacement, reduction and similar gimmicks but nothing worked, Allen"s method got me off in a matter of hours. Even though these ASH people might mean well, in the long run they are not going to help by teaching wrong things. The only way to stop is by stopping and not by replacing or reducing, break the illusions and remember there was a life before smoking.ï»¿

How absolutely dehgtliful to be able to think of matjes herring in the middle of the working day! Well, being Estonian-born, this has been mother"s milk for all my life and one of Mom"s older sisters having married a Polish army general, the only somewhat differing wellknown recipes are bringing a smile on my also Asian and fusion Oz foodie face ! Thanks, and I actually have a pouch of guess what in the fridge!

MuentionsmanDicember 20, 2012 at 11:30 pmSo we get knocked out by bayern. That will be quick efficient and brutal. Then, out of all competitions (fa cup soon to follow) we will be able to focus entirely on the league and probably secure 4th spot. Ho hum……. What is the point of AFC??

Bernie from United Kingdom, September 14, 2012 at 6:29 PM A very old and quaint peferct small lakeside hotel with 15 rooms including a few suites. A very nice large pool is set in an old olive grove/ garden which was secluded with lovely lake views and was only a short walk from the hotel. The very small harbour adjoining the hotel has the taverna" attached so drinks and food are available served by first rate staff for most of the day and evening. The food and service was excellent and nothing was too much trouble! A beautiful place to visit as a couple, but if you have children the water is never far away, other than the pool and stoney beach" they may be bored . The lounge was only large enough for about half a dozen people to sit, so really everyone, nearly all couples, did their own thing. Wifi worked peferctley. As for us? We loved it, and will be back ASAP !

Is poor old Allen Carr dead?I can"t say I used his books to quit, but he probably heepld to create a climate in which I believed it was possible. The main thing preventing people from stopping is the belief that they won"t be able.I was like you - a total addict smoking 50 Rothmans a day, until the answer dawned on me: just don"t do it! Allen Carr probably had something to do with that, and I thank him for it.

Luca from Italy, September 30, 2012 at 9:42 PM Ho soggiornato un week end di setbemtre con mia moglie in questo bellissimo posto, acquistando un regalo che comprendeva il pernottamento con colazione, la cena con degustazione e un aperitivo sul molo. Appena arrivati ci siamo sistemati nella ns camera (bella, con vista lago, con arredi e mobili d"epoca) e poi siamo andati a rilassarci in piscina, sempre con vista lago e circondata da ulivi. Dopo poco abbiamo iniziato a percepire l"atmosfera magica di questo posto, culminata con l"aperitivo sul molo prima di cena: ti senti fuori dal mondo, a due passi dal lago, al tramonto, con poca gente (fino alle 18 non c"era un posto a sedere) e cigni ed anatre che nuotavano davanti a noi Bellissimo! La cena ci e" stata servita nel piccolo giardino vista lago: posto molto affascinante, (anche se molto pieno), due proposte: un menu" di carne l"altro di pesce. Qualita" buona, valido il servizio con personale attento. Colazione sempre vista lago, abbondante e di buona qualita". Posto quindi fantastico.

Hello Bella... what a beautiful ltlite "nest" you have created for yourself in your garden... I too have that book by Edith Holden, and I refer to it all the time... I know she would approve of your beautiful flowers and setting for tea... love your pretty pillows, such an inviting spot!... the puppies are so cute too!... xoxo Julie Marie
